# The `GCStatepointInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents a gc.statepoint intrinsic call. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::GCStatepointInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Represents a gc.statepoint intrinsic call.

This extends directly from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> as the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst">IntrinsicInst</a> only supports calls and gc.statepoint is invokable.

Definition at line 61 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/statepoint-h">Statepoint.h</a>.

### getActualCalledOperand() {#af196b6ea9e0a63c97336480d7fe60c27}
